title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1742/86 of 4 June 1986 amending Regulation (EEC) No 756/70 on granting aid for skimmed milk processed into casein and caseinates
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 1742/86
of 4 June 1986
amending Regulation (EEC) No 756/70 on granting aid for skimmed milk processed into casein and caseinates
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Article 2 (1) of Regulation (EEC) No 756/70, '8,55 ECU' is hereby replaced by '9,30 ECU'.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply with effect from 2 June 1986.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 4 June 1986.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 148, 28. 6. 1968, p. 13.
(2) OJ No L 119, 8. 5. 1986, p. 19.
(3) OJ No L 91, 25. 4. 1970, p. 28.
(4) OJ No L 155, 14. 6. 1985, p. 16.
